biotools.summary: The theory and methods behind NMFF are based on searching along a few lowest frequency normal mode vectors, constructed from a multi-resolution elastic network representation of the atomic structure of interest, to maximize the correlation between the computed electron density for the flexible model and the experimental density.

bioschemas.name: NMFF
bioschemas.summary: The theory and methods behind NMFF are based on searching along a few lowest frequency normal mode vectors, constructed from a multi-resolution elastic network representation of the atomic structure of interest, to maximize the correlation between the computed electron density for the flexible model and the experimental density.
